text:
(1) Clove Valley: A Greek oven in the valley, at Castleton corners.

By Wm. T. Davis through P. L. Sperr

(2) A winter scene of the Clove Valley, seen across Victory Boulevard from near Clove Road. On the left is a Department of Water Supply pumping station on Ontario Avenue.
February, 1924

P. L. Sperr

(3) Another winter scene, near Victory Boulevard.

P. L. Sperr

title: Richmond: [Staten Island] - Clove Valley.

text:
Victory Boulevard, west from near Clove Road.
April 2, 1924

P. L. Sperr

1222 Clove Road, at the N.W. corner of Victory Boulevard, showing the Clove Lake Inn.

April 29, 1929.

P. L. Sperr.
